alert.note: Alert for Echols (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 6:55PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Columbia, eastern Hamilton and southeastern Echols Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 655 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Suwannee Valley to near Providence. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake City, White Springs, Five Points, Watertown, Winfield, Suwannee Valley and Belmont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
